#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n,m,ans,i,j,x,x1,y1,x2,y2;
    
    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
    
    int a[n+1][m+1];
    
    for ( i = 1; i <= n; i++ ) {
        for ( j = 1; j <= m; j++ ) {
            scanf("%d", &a[i][j]);
        }
    }
    
    scanf("%d", &x);
    
    while ( x-- ) {
          scanf("%d%d%d%d", &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2);
          ans = 0;
          for ( i = x1; i <= x2; i++ ) {
              for ( j = y1; j <= y2; j++ ) {
                  ans += a[i][j];
              }
          }
          printf("%d\n", ans);
    }
    
    return 0;
}
